import React, { useContext, useEffect } from 'react'; import { headerContext } from '../../context/HeaderContext'; import "./Header.css" import SearchOutlinedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/SearchOutlined'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Header = () => { const { getHeader, header } = useContext(headerContext) useEffect(() => { getHeader() }, []) return (
{header.map((item) => (
О нас Коллекции Новости

Тел:{item.number}

Избранное
Корзина
))}
); }; export default Header;
